name: (C) Ref. Case RTU, NG Heat
_description: Ref. case gas furnace integrated in packaged rooftop unit plus ventilation

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average of typical commercial RTU lifetime

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies: Appendix A
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Admnistration

market_scaling_fractions_source.notes: Heating multiple of 92% was determined by dividing square feet in which main heating equipment is gas packaged unit (14491406 sf) by square feet in shiwch main heating equipment is gas furnace or packaged unit (176461522 sf). Cooling equipment multiples determined by square feet in which given cooling system (e.g., RTAC, chiller) is pared with given heating system for the measure. Ventilation multiples determined by square feet in which given ventilation system (VAV or CAV) is paired with given heating system for the measure.
